content: विघट्ट् {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To strike down, disperse, scatter, scare away; <ls>Śi. 1. 64</ls>; <ls>Bh. 3. 54.</ls> {@--2@} To rub, strike, rub against; कारंडवाननविघट्टितवीचिमालाः <ls>Rs. 3. 8</ls>; <ls n="Rs.">4. 9</ls>; विघटृइतानां सरलद्रुमाणां <ls>Ku. 1. 9</ls> <ls>Ki. 8. 45</ls>; <ls>Śi. 8. 24</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">13. 41.</ls> {@--3@} To break, violate (as an agreement). {@--4@} To break asunder, burst open (as a door).
